name: Jikkyou Powerful Major League 2009
overview: Equipped with "World Baseball Classic" mode! !! Players from 16 countries and regions around the world are recorded with their real names! Enjoy hot battles at home as many times as you like! Also equipped with player edits that can change player abilities! Player training "Success" mode allows you to enjoy 5 scenarios! The "Major Life" mode, where you can enjoy the life of a major leaguer, and the "Season" mode, where you fight for the world champion, are also equipped with a new system, so you can enjoy it even more deeply! Of course, let's enjoy the major leagues together with the forecast data at the start of the 2009 season!
